GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns the type of the ApiThemeFormatScheme class.

SetSchemeName.name: SetSchemeName
SetSchemeName.description: Sets a name to the current theme format scheme.

ChangeFillStyles.name: ChangeFillStyles
ChangeFillStyles.description: Sets the fill styles to the current theme format scheme.

params.name: arrFill
params.description: The array of fill styles must contain 3 elements - subtle, moderate and intense fills. If an array is empty or NoFill elements are in the array, it will be filled with the Api.CreateNoFill() elements.

ChangeBgFillStyles.name: ChangeBgFillStyles
ChangeBgFillStyles.description: Sets the background fill styles to the current theme format scheme.

params.name: arrBgFill
params.description: The array of background fill styles must contains 3 elements - subtle, moderate and intense fills. If an array is empty or NoFill elements are in the array, it will be filled with the Api.CreateNoFill() elements.

ChangeLineStyles.name: ChangeLineStyles
ChangeLineStyles.description: Sets the line styles to the current theme format scheme.

params.name: arrLine
params.description: The array of line styles must contain 3 elements - subtle, moderate and intense fills. If an array is empty or ApiStroke elements are with no fill, it will be filled with the Api.CreateStroke(0, Api.CreateNoFill()) elements.

ChangeEffectStyles.name: ChangeEffectStyles
ChangeEffectStyles.description: Need to do Sets the effect styles to the current theme format scheme.

params.name: arrEffect
params.description: The array of effect styles must contain 3 elements - subtle, moderate and intense fills. If an array is empty or NoFill elements are in the array, it will be filled with the Api.CreateStroke(0, Api.CreateNoFill()) elements.

Copy.name: Copy
Copy.description: Creates a copy of the current theme format scheme.

ToJSON.name: ToJSON
ToJSON.description: Converts the ApiThemeFormatScheme object into the JSON object.

comment:
/**
     * Class representing a theme format scheme.
     * @constructor
     */
